title: Will not compile contracts - different behavior depending on pragma
body:
### Environment information

* `brownie` Version: 1.15.2
* `ganache-cli` Version: 6.12.2
* `solc` Version: 0.7.6 and 0.8.6
* Python Version:  3.8.10
* OS: Linux

### What was wrong?

Please include information like:

Trying to compile Uniswap contracts from this repo https://github.com/Uniswap/uniswap-v3-core
I set the compiler version in brownie.yaml because it complained about version early even though pragmas are all good
![Screen Shot 2021-08-06 at 8 28 34 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86681967/128581990-8e28fd53-fd55-4983-9ec6-053e8f4702a5.png)

I have the brownie.yaml file set to use 0.7.6, this works for most of the contracts but I have 2 that keeps trying to use the latest 0.8.6 even when I set the pragma specifically to 0.7.6
Coming in from the top you can see it running through the 0.7.6 compiler, then for some reason it switches to 0.8.6 even when specifically showing the pragma at 0.7.6
![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/809794189193773057/873357041899536444/Screen_Shot_2021-08-06_at_8.09.00_PM.png)
![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/809794189193773057/873356712600551504/Screen_Shot_2021-08-06_at_8.07.42_PM.png)

I tried to modify my pragma, shouldn't be an issue since it is >=
![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/809794189193773057/873357866407432242/Screen_Shot_2021-08-06_at_8.11.59_PM.png)

It works just fine on another contract in the project that has the same pragma
![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/809794189193773057/873358238354112573/Screen_Shot_2021-08-06_at_8.13.40_PM.png)

And if I change it to 0.8.6 it freaks out that its not 0.7.6
![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/809794189193773057/873358758221344788/Screen_Shot_2021-08-06_at_8.15.36_PM.png)

When I change them back to their original >=0.x.x it throws compilation errors but with the 0.8.6 compiler
![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/809794189193773057/873357041899536444/Screen_Shot_2021-08-06_at_8.09.00_PM.png)



### How can it be fixed?

Not a clue

I've tried to reproduce with the following commands:

```bash
git clone git@github.com:Uniswap/uniswap-v3-core.git
cd uniswap-v3-core
cat > brownie-config.yaml << EOF
compiler:
  solc:
    version: 0.7.6
EOF
brownie compile
```

however the project compiles successfully. Can you confirm if you did anything differently?
